locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: In this study, the typical wind farm system in Yulin City of Guangxi of Zhuang Autonomous Region China was selected as a case study site. The developer, namely, China Huadian Corporation, is a state-owned enterprise and devotes to develop wind power by providing wind power equipment and related service in China [37].
本研究选取中国广西壮族自治区玉林市的典型风电场系统作为案例研究地点。开发商即中国华电股份有限公司，是一家国有企业，通过提供风力发电设备及相关服务，致力于在中国发展风力发电[ 37 ]。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The described process pertains to the life cycle of a wind farm system mainly for the production of renewable energy, particularly wind power. The process considers the entire lifecycle of wind turbines, from production to end-of-life stages, in Yulin City, Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region, China. The system's lifecycle is split into five stages: production, transportation and installation, power generation, maintenance, and end-of-life recycling and disposal. The wind farm, equipped with 24 turbines each with a capacity of 1.25 MW, is intended for environmentally friendly power generation with an emphasis on economic feasibility and cost-effectiveness. The focus on CO2, SO2, NOX, and PM10 emissions, as well as cost per kWh of electricity, indicates the application of this dataset in measuring and analyzing the environmental impact and economic performance of wind energy systems in comparison to traditional thermal power generation.

所述工艺涉及中国广西壮族自治区玉林市风电场系统的生命周期，主要用于生产可再生能源，特别是风力发电。该过程考虑了从生产到生命周期末端阶段的风力涡轮机的全部生命周期。系统生命周期分为五个阶段：生产、运输与安装、发电、维护和报废回收处理。该风电场配备了24台风力涡轮机，每台容量为1.25 MW，旨在环保发电，注重经济可行性和成本效益。关注CO2、SO2、NOX和PM10排放量以及每千瓦时电力成本，表明该数据集在测量和分析与传统火力发电相比风能系统的环境影响和经济性能方面的应用。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: This wind farm is equipped with 24 wind turbines, with a production capacity of 1.25 MW for each turbine, and t the operation life for each turbine is expected to be 20 years. The life cycle of one wind power system can be divided into five stages, including (1) production, (2) transportation and installation, (3) power generation, (4) maintenance, and (5) end-of-life recycling and disposal. The input of non-renewable energy has been shown in each stage. In this study, raw material, fossil fuel consumption and corresponding emissions have been taken into account of a life cycle process. Meanwhile, cost-effectiveness of a wind farm is considered because the cost plays a very important role in operating a wind farm [38]. Considering the data reliability and availability, the cost data of this wind farm was mainly extracted from a feasibility report of one wind farm (with a designed capacity of the 49.5 MW) in Kang ping County of Liaoning province [39].

该风电场装有24台风电机组，每台机组的生产能力为1.25 MW，预计每台机组的运行寿命为20年。风电系统的生命周期可分为5个阶段： (1)生产制造、 (2)运输和安装、 (3)发电、 (4)维护和 (5)报废回收和处置。不可再生能源的投入在各个阶段都有所体现。在这项研究中，原材料、化石燃料的消耗和相应的排放都考虑了一个生命周期过程。同时，考虑风电场的成本效益，因为成本在风电场运营中扮演着非常重要的角色[38]。考虑到数据的可靠性和可获得性，该风电场的成本数据主要取自辽宁省康平县某风电场(设计容量为49.5 MW)的可行性报告[39]
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this LCA dataset, users should adhere to the outlined system boundaries and consider the full life cycle of the wind power system, which includes material sourcing, production, operation, and end-of-life management. Users should account for environmental aspects by measuring emissions of CO2, SO2, NOX, and PM10, as well as the economic aspects by considering the cost per kWh of electricity generated. It is crucial to integrate cost data from reliable sources such as feasibility reports from similar wind farms. Analysts may compare the environmental and economic performance of this system against traditional power generation methods to highlight the co-benefits of wind energy. Always ensure data consistency and proper methodological alignment with current LCA standards and practices. This information is vital for stakeholders looking to invest, develop, or improve wind power infrastructure with a focus on sustainability and economy.

在使用该生命周期评价(LCA)数据集时，用户应遵循所概述的系统边界，并考虑风力发电系统的完整生命周期，包括原材料采购、生产、运作和生命周期末端管理。用户应通过测量CO2、SO2、NOX和PM10的排放来考虑环境方面，以及通过考虑每千瓦时发电的成本来考虑经济方面。关键是要整合来自类似风电场的可靠来源如可行性报告的成本数据。分析师可以将该系统的环境和经济性能与传统的发电方法进行比较，以突出风能的共同利益。始终确保数据的一致性和与当前生命周期评价标准和实践的正确方法论对齐。这些信息对于寻求投资、开发或以可持续性和经济性为重点改善风力发电基础设施的利益相关者至关重要。
